systemPrompt.description: The system prompt that defines the agent's behavior and personality.

tools.description: Array of tools available to the agent. Can be empty for simple chat agents. Each tool extends the agent's capabilities.

tool.description: A tool that the agent can use. Tool type determines available properties.

vectorSearchTool.description: Vector database search tool for semantic retrieval from knowledge bases.

index.description: The name of the vector database index/collection to query.

namespace.description: The namespace/partition within the index to search.

description.description: Human-readable description of what this knowledge base contains. Helps the LLM decide when to use this tool.

topK.description: Number of top results to return from vector search.

vectorSearchWithRerankingTool.description: Vector database search with re-ranking for improved relevance. Retrieves more candidates (topK) and re-ranks them to return the most relevant subset (topN).

index.description: The name of the vector database index/collection to query.

namespace.description: The namespace/partition within the index to search.

description.description: Human-readable description of what this knowledge base contains. Helps the LLM decide when to use this tool.

topK.description: Number of initial candidates to retrieve from vector search before re-ranking.

topN.description: Number of final results to return after re-ranking.
